root.name: Juno First
root.description: There is a limited amount of time to defeat the enemies in each wave. Your spaceship starts out with a laser that has a longer reach than the enemy weapons. The enemies start out firing a few bullets at your ship. The amount enemy fire rapidly increases as you progress through to the next waves. Certain enemies fire tracking missile-like projectiles that can shoot additional bullets. (I'm using the term bullets even though the weapons are most likely energy based; it is space.)
